articles.description: All the latest football news, including Liverpool, Aston Villa, Man City and Real Madrid news conferences, plus build-up to Tuesday's Champions League action as Celtic face Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Liverpool, Aston Villa, Man City and Real Madrid news conferences, plus Champions League build-up as Celtic play Bayern

articles.description: Jannik Sinner's case was "a million miles away from doping", says World Anti-Doping Agency general counsel Ross Wenzel.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Tennis world number one's case 'million miles away from doping', says Wada general counsel

articles.description: Everton fans get their first view inside the club's new ground at a Bramley-Moore Dock Stadium test event.
articles.title: Everton Stadium: 'It's out of this world' - Toffees fans get first glimpse of new stadium

articles.description: The Champions Trophy may feel like a tournament from a bygone age but it is crucial for England, who need to lift fans after a dark winter.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: England need Brendon McCullum to bring back the smiles

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers calls for his Celtic team to play without fear and have no regrets in the second leg of their Champions League play-off against Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Rodgers wants no regrets and urges Celtic bravery against Bayern

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the landscape of the heavyweight division before Daniel Dubois' world title defence against Joseph Parker on Saturday.
articles.title: Dubois vs Parker: What next for Tyson Fury, Anthony Joshua, and the rest of the heavyweight division

articles.description: The Spanish Football Federation condemns the "repulsive" abuse suffered by a referee following his decision to send off Real Madrid's Jude Bellingham.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: Real Madrid midfielder's red card led to 'repulsive' abuse of referee

articles.description: Shane Lowry's The Bay got the better of Rory McIlroy's Boston Common Golf Club to conclude the Tomorrow's Golf League (TGL) triple-header on Monday in Florida.
articles.title: Tomorrow's Golf League: Rory McIlroy's Boston Common Golf team beaten by Shane Lowry's The Bay

articles.description: Former Wales rugby star Louis Rees-Zammit re-signs as a wide receiver for Jacksonville Jaguars.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit re-signs as wide receiver for Jacksonville Jaguars

articles.description: Liverpool defender Joe Gomez could require surgery after suffering another hamstring injury, Arne Slot tells a news conference.
articles.title: Joe Gomez: Liverpool defender may need hamstring injury operation, says Arne Slot
